name: Kalkar Associate
overview:
Established in the year 1990, we, “Kalkar & Associate”, are a distinguished firm providing Real Estate Services, Real State Consultancy, Interior Designing Services and Landscaping Services in Nagpur, Maharashtra. Possessing complete knowledge of the domain and the sector, we also offer our valuable customers solutions related to Real Estate Consultancy.

Service Portfolio: Our excellence lies in rendering Real Estate Services, Real State Consultancy, Interior Designing Services and Landscaping Services in Nagpur that are known for their effective results. Residential project development Commercial Developer Commercial Land Dealing Commercial Property Dealing Residential Property Dealing

Domain Expertise: Our firm is a noted name engaged in offering a wide spectrum of services including Interior Designing solutions. Our professionals visit the places to be designed and then plan out every things related to it. The usage of decorative items, colour schemes and space allocation are properly looked after by the interior designers.

Our Team: Architects Interior designers Quality controllers Project supervisors Management personnel

Our Quality Assurance: We give top most priority to maintain the quality consistency at every stage of the business process. All the services are undertaken under the strict vigilance of the quality auditors hired by us. All the material used in interior designing purpose is of premium quality and procured from trusted vendors.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client centric organization, we focus on channelizing all our efforts towards attaining their utmost satisfaction. Our professionals personally visit the site of the clients so as to plan out the specific designs for the establishments and interiors. With our wide spectrum of services, we have been able to meet the requirements of residential and commercial sectors. Moreover, all our solutions can be availed by clients at reasonable prices.
